Text.Value: An honour to battle at your side. Jaheira is right to trust in you.
I must be brief: if you intend to reach Moonrise, no torch nor blessing will fully guard you.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting at bridge - Has not met

Text.Value: The next step is yours alone to take. Make it a careful one.
Yet I know what can - a strange lantern, used by a cultist convoy that oft passes.
You have other matters to pursue, surely.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting next to inn - Has met

Text.Value: But do not be long. Our chances grow thinner with each moment that passes.
Keep on your toes. Cultists are on the move.
The barrier's dropped. Find the light, and stick to it.
Pardon, but I've no mind for small talk.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting next to inn - Has not met

Text.Value: Indeed? Then be grateful your head still sits atop your shoulders.
Together, we will take it by force - you simply need speak the word.
Let the Moonlantern light your way, friend.
Then prepare. I will stand wait.
Weapons at the ready.
I need time to prepare.
Let's take on that convoy. You lead, I follow.
Time to show us your might.
At the ready!
Get to Moonrise, and get it done.
Quickly, then. I will mark your map, should we be separated.
Very well. I will mark your map.
You're too late - I've encountered the convoy, led by a drider.
Go on ahead. I'll catch up.

Synopsis: A Harper, proposing a mission that will see them trying to kill a drider.
